item.title: Alcohol Limit 0.08% - Lopez Island
item.description: Ferry Road south on Lopez Island. Alcohol Limit 0.08% - Don’t Drink and Drive. This is a standard sign on Washington highways.

item.title: Lopez Ferry Terminal
item.description: Ferry Road north on Lopez Island approaching Lopez Ferry Terminal.
